attributes.name: Close Shot
attributes.description: Boosts the ability to make shots (non-dunk/layup) within 10 feet of the basket, especially effective against defensive contests.

attributes.name: Driving Layup
attributes.description: Increases the ability to finish layups effectively while driving to the basket, including navigating through traffic and absorbing contact.

attributes.name: Driving Dunk
attributes.description: Determines a player's ability to perform dunks in traffic and on fast breaks. Higher ratings unlock more athletic and contact dunk animations.

attributes.name: Standing Dunk
attributes.description: Improves a player's ability to perform dunks while standing under the basket, crucial for bigs on offensive rebounds and post moves.

attributes.name: Post Control
attributes.description: Affects the success of post moves, spins, and drop-steps. A higher rating also helps protect the ball from being stolen in the post.

attributes.name: Mid-Range Shot
attributes.description: Boosts the ability to make open and contested jump shots taken from inside the three-point line but outside of the close-shot range.

attributes.name: Three-Point Shot
attributes.description: Increases a player's accuracy when shooting from beyond the three-point arc. Higher ratings reduce the impact of defensive contests.

attributes.name: Free Throw
attributes.description: Determines a player's accuracy from the free-throw line. A crucial attribute for drawing fouls and capitalizing on free points.

attributes.name: Pass Accuracy
attributes.description: Increases the speed and accuracy of passes, reducing the chance of turnovers. Unlocks better passing animations like bullet passes and alley-oops.

attributes.name: Ball Handle
attributes.description: Improves a player's ability to dribble effectively and perform advanced dribble moves, while also making it harder for defenders to steal the ball.

attributes.name: Speed with Ball
attributes.description: Determines how fast a player can run while dribbling the ball. Essential for fast breaks and blowing by defenders.

attributes.name: Interior Defense
attributes.description: Boosts a player's ability to effectively contest shots, box out opponents, and stay in front of offensive players in the paint.

attributes.name: Perimeter Defense
attributes.description: Improves a player's ability to stay in front of ball handlers on the perimeter, contest outside shots, and navigate through screens.

attributes.name: Steal
attributes.description: Increases the chances of successfully stealing the ball from an opponent, both on-ball and by intercepting passes in the passing lanes.

attributes.name: Block
attributes.description: Enhances a player's ability to block shots from opponents. A higher rating also improves the chances of successfully chasing down players on a fast break.

attributes.name: Offensive Rebound
attributes.description: Determines a player's effectiveness at getting rebounds on the offensive end of the court, creating second-chance opportunities.

attributes.name: Defensive Rebound
attributes.description: Improves a player's ability to secure rebounds on the defensive end, which is key to preventing second-chance points and starting fast breaks.

attributes.name: Speed
attributes.description: Affects how fast a player can run without the ball. Crucial for getting back on defense, cutting to the basket, and moving around screens.

attributes.name: Acceleration
attributes.description: Determines how quickly a player can reach their top speed from a standstill or after changing directions.

attributes.name: Strength
attributes.description: Impacts a player's ability to back down opponents in the post, absorb contact on drives, box out for rebounds, and set effective screens.

attributes.name: Vertical
attributes.description: Affects a player's ability to jump high for rebounds, blocks, and dunks. It works in conjunction with other attributes to determine animation effectiveness.
